segments.text: Thank you for a lovely day . I really enjoyed it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was nice to have you with us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for the picnic too . It was supper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . It was a pleasure . Perhaps you will come out with us again while you are here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I'd love to . Thanks again . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1
